column1: Art Institute of Chicago////This is one of Chicago's most iconic landmarks! Admission here comes at a steep price
column2: but they offer multiple discounts as well as free days. You really get what you pay for here
column3: as the museum is absolutely gorgeous
column4: and the art is created by the most talented artists in the world. To my knowledge
column5: the modern wing changes every few weeks
column6: but some exhibits stay constant. My personal favorite
column8: has been there every time I visited. I can go on and on about this place
column9: plan to spend an entire afternoon here!
